content: this legal text summarizes an agreement between three individuals regarding the division of two properties in castelfidardo italy the first property is a ground floor apartment with two bedrooms a living room a kitchen and a courtyard the second property is a firstfloor apartment with the same features the parties have agreed to divide the ownership of these properties into two shares one individual will own the first share while the second share will be equally shared between two individuals each share is valued at €30000 the agreement also states that the parties are responsible for the expenses related to the agreement the document is signed by the parties and a notary
